item.title: High Velocity Aerial Filming
item.description:
High Velocity Aerial Filming

Aerial Filming took a giant leap forward when Blue Sky and Peter Degerfeldt challenged Gyro-stabilized Systems in Grass Valley, US, to build a GSS 520 5 axis system that would produce rock solid images at a speed of more than 300 knots per hour.

item.title: Paint With Fire Using This Virtual Reality App
item.description:
Paint With Fire Using This Virtual Reality App

Vocativ uses intelligent technology, smart journalists and the wisdom of the crowd to find story leads and angles no other news organization can.

item.title: What it's like to ride in the Tesla Model 3
item.description:
What it's like to ride in the Tesla Model 3

HAWTHORNE, California - I've had a terrible flu all week. My body aches, my head is pounding, and my throat feels like it might fall out of my neck. Right now, though, I'm riding in the Tesla Model 3, one of the most hotly anticipated cars in the world...
